attributes.action: MAKE FINANCIAL BENEFIT AND FULL HOUSING BENEFIT AVAILABLE FOR THE BLIND PEOPLE
attributes.additional_details: The government does not currently take care of the blind people in any type of way, blind people need free housing and financial subsistence as well as carers checking in to their government funded homes to help them with self care etc DAILY..today the government does not care if people are losing their ability to see (their sight) people blind need absolute priority of care/housing and financial assistance more than people with children!!
attributes.background: MAKE LEGISLATION AND WORK CLOSELY WITH THE DWP TO MAKE SPECIAL UK GOV ARRANGEMENTS FOR FULL BENEFIT/CREDIT TO BLIND PEOPLE OR PEOPLE LOSING THEIR SIGHT TO HAVE THEM FULLY HOUSED AND GIVE FINANCIAL SUBSISTENCE/ASSISTANCE AND CARE FOR THESE PEOPLE TO LIVE THEIR LIVES COMPLETELY UNDER GOVERNMENT CARE.

rejection.details:
Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.

We're not sure exactly what you'd like the Government or Parliament to do. The Government already provides benefits for disabled people. You can read more here

https://www.gov.uk/browse/benefits/disability

You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like the Government or Parliament to do.
